title: The Lost Castle: The Adventures of RJ the Mouse
description: The Lost Castle (The Adventures of RJ the Mouse) is about friendship, determination, and helping others as RJ and his best friend Snow the Owl follow their treasure map. They learn that not all adventures are about the prize, but the journey there. Their world is full of new people around every corner, but not all the inhabitants are friends, and RJ and Snow find themselves as the ones needing help.
author: Robby Silk
